The Ocean Base is starting to explode!.Translation: The Ocean Base is starting to explode!

Find a place to hide and hold here for 4.Translation: Find a place to hide and hold here for 45secs until a path is clear!!

Path clear. Make your way to the other e.Translation: Path clear. Make your way to the other end of the base before it's too late!

Modern Lab path opening in 5secs. RUN!!.Translation: Modern Lab path opening in 5secs. RUN!!

Swim to the wrecked ship. We'll have to.Translation: Swim to the wrecked ship. We'll have to go through the hole in the hull.

Old Lab path opening in 5secs. RUN!!.Translation: Old Lab path opening in 5secs. RUN!!

Use the pipes along the wall to get acro.Translation: Use the pipes along the wall to get across the pit of fire!

Make your way to the other end of the ba.Translation: Make your way to the other end of the ballroom! There's a hole in the railing to can use to make it to the second floor!

Jump and slide down to use the ladders t.Translation: Jump and slide down to use the ladders to get off the ceiling!
